thread.title: Ellen
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ellen

author: Ellen
title: Ellen
text: Went into the store and spoke with Jeremy who was very courtesy, helpful and did not pressure us to buy anything. My daughter on a previous visit also spoke with Jeremy and was very pleased with his help. We ended up purchasing many items for our new house. I would recommend this store to my friends. That you Jeremy.
